wdi2-SI.SPR.PCAP.def: Mean consumption or income per capita (2017 PPP $ per day) used in calculating the growth rate in the welfare aggregate of total population.
wdi2-SI.SPR.PCAP.name: Survey mean consumption or income per capita
wdi2-SI.SPR.PCAP.source: World Bank, Global Database of Shared Prosperity (GDSP) (http://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/poverty/brief/global-database-of-shared-prosperity).
